transArray.content: The front desk service is good. The surrounding area is very convenient. Very close to the subway.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides guests with great convenience for eating, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service. Your pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! Manager: Zhang Minghui
